text: It's hard to believe that IBM is proud of Nobody ever got fired for buying IBM. It was their patent on mediocrity. How many IBM people hid behind that excuse for not doing something they could do, that the market wanted but they could obstruct because they were seen as the safe non-controversial choice. Of course eventually this ran out, I was happy to be there when it happened. They tried to FUD Windows and Compaq and guess what, it didn't work. :boom:
